title.value: Operational Ontology for Oncology (O3) - Multi-professional society standard supporting AI
title.justification: The title includes the main focus of the paper which is to create a standard to support AI in oncology through an operational ontology.
title.quote: Operational Ontology for Oncology (O3) - Multi-professional society standard supporting AI

extractions.description: The paper discusses the development of a standardized ontology aimed at improving the interoperability and AI-readiness of data in radiation oncology by addressing issues related to data standardization in electronic health records and other cancer care databases.

type.justification: The paper primarily focuses on creating a theoretical framework for data standardization in oncology.
type.quote: The effort sought to create a standardized ontology for clinical data, social determinants of health (SDOH), and other radiation oncology concepts and interrelationships to overcome these gaps.

name.justification: The research integrates concepts from oncology, AI, and data standardization.
The paper emphasizes constructing AI-ready datasets.
name.quote: ...interoperable, artificial intelligence (AI) ready data sets from real world data.

name.justification: The study is set within the context of radiation oncology.
name.quote: ...and other radiation oncology concepts and interrelationships to overcome these gaps.
